topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b36aa26368727a2f5f0100#post_53b36aa26368727a2f5f0100
A lot of People actually like Tendou

From what I've seen, Fans of Kabuto believe that He's arrogant in a way that's fun to watch

And If they're to be believed, The Writers seem fully aware that He's Arrogant, And Take an interesting look on that character archetype

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b36c1563687269120e0200#post_53b36c1563687269120e0200
*sigh*
Gilgamesh probably. Kyubey's a horrible monster but he means well, sort of. Tendou is a bland Gary Stu devoid of all character. But Gil. He HAS a character. A bad one. He's so pompous and arrogant. [spoiler]Not to mention a full on rapist.[/spoiler]
